required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Donanemab (LY3002813) in Participants With Early Alzheimer's Disease (TRAILBLAZER-ALZ 2)
clinical_study.official_title: Assessment of Safety, Tolerability, and Efficacy of Donanemab in Early Symptomatic Alzheimer's Disease

brief_summary.textblock: The reason for this study is to see how safe and effective the study drug donanemab is in participants with early Alzheimer's disease.

primary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline on the Clinical Dementia Rating Scale-Sum of Boxes (CDR-SB)
primary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline on the CDR-SB

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline on the Mini Mental State Examination (MMSE) Score
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline on the MMSE Score

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline on the Alzheimer's Disease Assessment Scale - Cognitive Subscale (ADAS-Cog13)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline on the ADAS-Cog13

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline on the integrated Alzheimer's Disease Rating Scale (iADRS)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline on the iADRS

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline on the Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study - instrumental Activities of Daily Living (ADCS-iADL) Score
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline on the Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study - instrumental Activities of Daily Living (ADCS-iADL) Score

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Brain Amyloid Plaque Deposition as Measured by Florbetapir F18 Positron Emission Tomography (PET) Scan
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline in Brain Amyloid Plaque Deposition as measured by Florbetapir F18 PET Scan

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Brain Tau Deposition as Measured by Flortaucipir F18 PET Scan
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline in Brain Tau Deposition as Measured by Flortaucipir F18 PET Scan

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Brain Volume as Measured by volumetric Magnetic Resonance Imaging (vMRI)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline in Brain Volume as Measured by vMRI

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics (PK): Average Serum Concentration of Donanemab
secondary_outcome.description: PK: Average Serum Concentration of Donanemab

secondary_outcome.measure: Number or Participants with Anti-Donanemab Antibodies
secondary_outcome.description: Number or Participants with Anti-Donanemab Antibodies

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Gradual and progressive change in memory function reported by participants or informants for ≥ 6 months
- MMSE score of 20 to 28 (inclusive) at baseline
- Meet 18F flortaucipir PET scan (central read) criteria
- Meet 18F florbetapir PET scan (central read) criteria
- Have a study partner who will provide written informed consent to participate
Exclusion Criteria:
- Contraindication to MRI or PET scans
- Current treatment with immunoglobulin G (IgG) therapy

link.description: A Study of Donanemab (LY3002813) in Participants with Early Alzheimer's Disease (TRAILBLAZER-ALZ 2)

patient_data.ipd_description: Anonymized individual patient level data will be provided in a secure access environment upon approval of a research proposal and a signed data sharing agreement.
patient_data.ipd_time_frame: Data are available 6 months after the primary publication and approval of the indication studied in the US and EU, whichever is later. Data will be indefinitely available for requesting.
patient_data.ipd_access_criteria: A research proposal must be approved by an independent review panel and researchers must sign a data sharing agreement.
